channel.title: Attack animation help
channel.description:
So I added that 525 animation tutorial by SWAT and everything was working pretty well until I noticed that when I attack the weapon disappears. I know that this isn't about the getanim crap, cause I've added all the weapon anims and stuff but that didn't fix the problem. Also whenever I use my client with a dodian base it seems to show the weapon when attacking but it's really messed up.
Server base: Delta cleaned by Johnny J Client: non-renamed
Can anyone help? Thanks

item.title: Attack animation help
item.dc:creator: @galade57465746 galade57465746
item.description:
@galade57465746 wrote:

So I added that 525 animation tutorial by SWAT and everything was working pretty well until I noticed that when I attack the weapon disappears. I know that this isn’t about the getanim crap, cause I’ve added all the weapon anims and stuff but that didn’t fix the problem.
Also whenever I use my client with a dodian base it seems to show the weapon when attacking but it’s really messed up.

Server base: Delta cleaned by Johnny J
Client: non-renamed

Can anyone help?
Thanks
